          Monitoring service for accelerometer.

          Interface for custom observer framework used to provide updates to CIMON administration app.

          A custom observer class used to provide updates to CIMON administration app.

          Maintains current value of metrics and status.

          Defines interface used for updating values in the administration app.

          Adapter for listview in tabs of administration app.
CimonListAdapter.GroupHolder
          Extension of CimonListAdapter.ViewHolder to include additional fields for unexpanded group view.
CimonListAdapter.MyCursorHelper
          Helper class for Cursor management: Data validity ID from the Cursor for use in adapter IDs Swapping cursors but maintaining other metadata
CimonListAdapter.ViewHolder
          Holder object for view objects related to a group or child view in the ListView.
Conditions
          Condition constants and helper methods for constructing expression strings.
ConditionTree
          A binary tree which represents an active event notification or conditional monitor.

          A CurrentNode used specifically for geo-location metrics.

          Receiver which handles proximity alerts from the Android LocationService.

          Monitoring service for CPU loads.

          Monitoring service for CPU utilization.
CurrentNode
          Interface which defines nodes that maintain triple-linked-list structure for all actively monitored metrics.
DataEntry
          Time and value pair for a single data entry in the Data table.
EavesdropList
          List of opportunistic periodic monitor requests for a specific metric, sorted by maximum allowed update period.
EventList
          Maintains static list of all active event notification monitors and conditional monitors.
ExpandableListActivity
          ***NOTE*** This is a copy of android.app.ExpandableListActivity designed to extend FragmentActivity rather than Activity.
ExpressionNode
          Node within a ConditionTree.
